import React from 'react' import styles from '../styles/ContactForm.module.css' import firebase from '../server/firebase' import { Formik, Form, Field, ErrorMessage, } from 'formik' import * as Yup from 'yup' const initialValues = { password: '', email: '', parentname: '', childname: '', repassword: '' } const ContactForm = () => { async function registerUser(){ // console.log('Form data', values) console.log('form submit start') const db = firebase.firestore(); db.collection("studentdb").add({ parentname: "parengtname", username: "childname", userType: "student" }) .then(function() { console.log("Document successfully written!"); }) .catch(function(error) { console.error("Error writing document: ", error); }); console.log('form submit end') } return (

contatct Us

) } export default ContactForm
